dr-plan-execution
*****************


Description
===========

The details of a DR plan execution.


Available Commands
==================

* cancel

* create

* create-failover

* create-failover-precheck

* create-start-drill

* create-start-drill-precheck

* create-stop-drill

* create-stop-drill-precheck

* create-switchover

* create-switchover-precheck

* delete

* get

* ignore

* list

* pause

* resume

* retry

* update
